00090     public function write($filename = null, Zend_Config $config = null, $exclusiveLock = null)
00091     {
00092         if ($filename !== null) {
00093             $this->setFilename($filename);
00094         }
00095 
00096         if ($config !== null) {
00097             $this->setConfig($config);
00098         }
00099 
00100         if ($exclusiveLock !== null) {
00101             $this->setExclusiveLock($exclusiveLock);
00102         }
00103 
00104         if ($this->_filename === null) {
00105             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00106             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('No filename was set');
00107         }
00108 
00109         if ($this->_config === null) {
00110             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00111             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('No config was set');
00112         }
00113 
00114         $xml         = new SimpleXMLElement('<zend-config xmlns:zf="' . Zend_Config_Xml::XML_NAMESPACE . '"/>');
00115         $extends     = $this->_config->getExtends();
00116         $sectionName = $this->_config->getSectionName();
00117 
00118         if (is_string($sectionName)) {
00119             $child = $xml->addChild($sectionName);
00120 
00121             $this->_addBranch($this->_config, $child, $xml);
00122         } else {
00123             foreach ($this->_config as $sectionName => $data) {
00124                 if (!($data instanceof Zend_Config)) {
00125                     $xml->addChild($sectionName, (string) $data);
00126                 } else {
00127                     $child = $xml->addChild($sectionName);
00128 
00129                     if (isset($extends[$sectionName])) {
00130                         $child->addAttribute('zf:extends', $extends[$sectionName], Zend_Config_Xml::XML_NAMESPACE);
00131                     }
00132 
00133                     $this->_addBranch($data, $child, $xml);
00134                 }
00135             }
00136         }
00137 
00138         $dom = dom_import_simplexml($xml)->ownerDocument;
00139         $dom->formatOutput = true;
00140 
00141         $xmlString = $dom->saveXML();
00142 
00143         $flags = 0;
00144 
00145         if ($this->_exclusiveLock) {
00146             $flags |= LOCK_EX;
00147         }
00148 
00149         $result = @file_put_contents($this->_filename, $xmlString, $flags);
00150 
00151         if ($result === false) {
00152             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00153             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('Could not write to file "' . $this->_filename . '"');
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00165     protected function _addBranch(Zend_Config $config, SimpleXMLElement $xml, SimpleXMLElement $parent)
00166     {
00167         $branchType = null;
00168 
00169         foreach ($config as $key => $value) {
00170             if ($branchType === null) {
00171                 if (is_numeric($key)) {
00172                     $branchType = 'numeric';
00173                     $branchName = $xml->getName();
00174                     $xml        = $parent;
00175 
00176                     unset($parent->{$branchName});
00177                 } else {
00178                     $branchType = 'string';
00179                 }
00180             } else if ($branchType !== (is_numeric($key) ? 'numeric' : 'string')) {
00181                 require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00182                 throw new Zend_Config_Exception('Mixing of string and numeric keys is not allowed');
00183             }
00184 
00185             if ($branchType === 'numeric') {
00186                 if ($value instanceof Zend_Config) {
00187                     $child = $parent->addChild($branchName, (string) $value);
00188 
00189                     $this->_addBranch($value, $child, $parent);
00190                 } else {
00191                     $parent->addChild($branchName, (string) $value);
00192                 }
00193             } else {
00194                 if ($value instanceof Zend_Config) {
00195                     $child = $xml->addChild($key);
00196 
00197                     $this->_addBranch($value, $child, $xml);
00198                 } else {
00199                     $xml->addChild($key, (string) $value);
00200                 }
00201             }
00202         }
00203     }
